author: kevin
msg: Make it possible to commit to xml without a specified revision.
* commit.c:send_to_repos - If using xml and no revnum is specified, we
don't call compose_editors.  Instead, we need to copy our temp editor
to the variable we actually pass down.

since it still contains the dirsep.
